# Clinical data

Minimal necessary clinical data for scoring are pooled and uploaded to a
separate data base.

The scripts used are fairly trivial, but can serve as inspirational. The
functions used can [be found
here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agdamsbo/cSVD-burden-annotation-and-analysis-project/main/R/functions.R).

The simple pipeline is as follows


::: {.cell}

:::


# Using REDCap

All clinical data capturing for this project is performed with
[REDCap](https://projectredcap.org/).

Get our most recent [data dictionary
here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agdamsbo/cSVD-burden-annotation-and-analysis-project/main/data/svd-datadictionary.csv)
to inspect. Note that the text on a few fields are in Danish.
